item.description:
Cool Season Vegetable Gardening

Ellen Moriarty of Ladybug Landscaping teaches this class designed for gardening newbies who want to learn how to plant for fall and winter harvests or how to start and improve a new garden. Traditional, raised-bed and container gardens will be discussed with an emphasis on organic methods of creating a productive vegetable and herb garden. The workshops begin with a short lecture and then follow with a lively Q & A about the participantâ€™s gardens.

Topics include: Essentials of healthy soil to produce healthy plants, How, when & what to start from seed, Identifying & controlling weeds, Preventing & controlling diseases & pests, Winter harvesting & preparing the garden for winter.

Cost: $15.
Pre-register with ladybuglandscaping@gmail.com
item.name: Cool Season Vegetable Gardening
